appetizers.description: gooey delicious hot breaded cheese sticks
yummy hot tortilla chips that can be dipped in either our home-made guac, or spicy salsa
dip our home made tortilla chips in our hot delicious spinach filled dip, with some added chicken bits

cold sandwiches.description: oven roasted turkey sandwiched between our chibata bread, with our home made mayonnaise, and added American cheese
american cheese and honey glazed ham with our homade mustard, and house white bread
homade egg salad with our house mayonnaise and fresh pickle slices, on top of our ciabata bread

hot sandwiches.description: our grilled cheese melt comes with homade spices, and provolgne cheese on a warm croissoint
a steak sandwich smothered in Philidelphian cheese, warmed to perfect
warm scrambled egg, with honey glazed bacon cooked to perfection on top of our house white bread

desserts.description: our homade chocolate melted fudge on top of signature Baskin Robbin's vanilla ice cream
cold cream cheese made, house crusted strawberry cream cheese is to die for
fresh picked apples, are warmed to perfect in our homeade apple pie powdered with cinnamon

drinks.description: drink our homade fresh lemonade drizzled with sweet natural sugars and get refreshed all over again
our orange juice is one of a kind, hand picked California oranges mixed with some H20 & agave
we serve hot coffee made to taste
